constituent: rue, regret, resentment, Freud, state of mind, silver, waitress, previously
koohiiStory1: If you don´t leave some silver as a tip, you will rue the day you earned the resentment of your waitress.
koohiiStory2: The resentment of a waitress who gave up going to college to help her boyfriend (with his tuition). She rues that decision ever since she got dumped by him (just after he graduated).
words:
感慨(かんがい): strong feelings, deep emotion
憤慨(ふんがい): indignation, resentment
